entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 22.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
